name: Eon Fleet
description: Eon empire is back! And now you have to get in your spaceship and defend your homeplanet against whole Eon Fleet! Eon Fleet is a simple, yet fun and challenging space shooter with huge amount of enemies from spaceships to asteroids and space mines. Simple and fun arcade gameplay Two different modes - campaign and endless mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: DualCore Graphics: 128mb Storage: 70 MB available space
